doc.author: lihongbo
doc.description: 网络投诉工单质检统计

sql.name: hbeoms.netsatisfy
sql.item: select '客服系统' as 申告部门, a.处理部门, a.工单总数, b.非常满意, c.满意, d.一般, e.不满意, f.很不满意 from (select b.处理部门, nvl(a.工单总数,0) as 工单总数 from (select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, count(distinct t.c1) as 工单总数 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and t.c802030511 is not null {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select distinct g.c630000018 as 处理部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {1}) b where a.处理部门(+)=b.处理部门) a, (select b.处理部门, nvl(a.非常满意,0) as 非常满意 from (select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, count(distinct t.c1) as 非常满意 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and t.c802030511='质检通过' and t.c700000021='非常满意' {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select distinct g.c630000018 as 处理部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {1}) b where a.处理部门(+)=b.处理部门) b, (select b.处理部门, nvl(a.满意,0) as 满意 from (select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, count(distinct t.c1) as 满意 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and t.c802030511='质检不通过' and t.c700000021='满意' {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select distinct g.c630000018 as 处理部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {1}) b where a.处理部门(+)=b.处理部门) c, (select b.处理部门, nvl(a.一般,0) as 一般 from (select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, count(distinct t.c1) as 一般 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and t.c802030511='质检不通过' and t.c700000021='一般' {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select distinct g.c630000018 as 处理部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {1}) b where a.处理部门(+)=b.处理部门) d, (select b.处理部门, nvl(a.不满意,0) as 不满意 from (select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, count(distinct t.c1) as 不满意 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and t.c802030511='质检不通过' and t.c700000021='不满意' {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select distinct g.c630000018 as 处理部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {1}) b where a.处理部门(+)=b.处理部门) e, (select b.处理部门, nvl(a.很不满意,0) as 很不满意 from (select g.c630000018 as 处理部门, count(distinct t.c1) as 很不满意 from {900} t,(select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log,{100} u,{200} g,{600} gu where log.c700020407=t.c1 and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020401=(select max(log.c700020401) from (select * from {700} union all select * from {800}) log where log.c700020402='完成' and log.c700020408=t.c700000001 and log.c700020407=t.c1) and log.c700020404=u.c630000001 and gu.c620000027=g.c1 and gu.c620000028=u.c1 --and t.c802030511='质检不通过' and t.c700000021='很不满意' {5} group by g.c630000018) a, (select distinct g.c630000018 as 处理部门 from {200} g where 1=1 {1}) b where a.处理部门(+)=b.处理部门) f where a.处理部门=b.处理部门 and b.处理部门=c.处理部门 and c.处理部门=d.处理部门 and d.处理部门=e.处理部门 and e.处理部门=f.处理部门
